Package index

All functions

AIC(<coxstream>)
Calculate the Akaike Information Criterion (AIC) for a 'coxstream' object
Surv()
Alias for Survival Function
basehaz()
Generic function for basehaz
basehaz(<coxstream>)
Predict the cumulative baseline hazard function for coxstream objects
basehaz_grad()
Gradient of the Baseline Hazard Function
basehaz_hess()
Hessian Matrix of the Baseline Hazard Function
basehaz_ode()
Baseline Hazard Function for ODE Evaluation
coef(<coxstream>)
Extract the coefficients from a coxstream object
coxstream() experimental
Streaming Cox model with repeated observations

Compute Log-Likelihood for 'coxstream' Objects

Objective Function for Optimization

Prediction method for coxtrans objects.

Update the coxstream with new data.
vcov(<coxstream>)
Extract variance-covariance matrix from a coxstream object
